game.name: Built By Force
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Co-op, Online Co-op, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Merge Titanfall-style gunplay with Satisfactory base-building and Minecraft exploration in a living, randomized world. Transform at will, master a single-resource economy, and join with up to 11 friends to face adaptive AI enemies.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Merge Titanfall-style gunplay with Satisfactory base-building and Minecraft exploration in a living, randomized world. Transform at will, master a single-resource economy, and join with up to 11 friends to face adaptive AI enemies.
